post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Are you looking at this time? I have the following position available:
Job Title WebSphere Technical Lead Location Toronto Salary: $60-75K
Responsibilities: As part of an advanced team specializes in J2EE systems architecture development using W.S.A.D. and Optimal J.
Requirements: Must have 5 years of Canadian I.T. experience Must have 2 years recent Team Lead exper Hands-on Development skill sin J2EE/Struts Framework with expertise in WebSphere & W.S.A.D. (WebLogis is an asset) Must be very strong in back-end, EJB Session/Entity/Messaging Beans Application development and Deployment Sun Certified in Java Components (SCJP, SCWCD, SCBCD) University Degree in Computer Science or Engineering Excellent communication skills Thanks. Debbie Rae INTPS Inc 905-940-6003 x 5028
post.title: WebSphere Technical Lead
